alert.note: Alert for Blair; Cambria; Clearfield; Huntingdon; Northern Centre; Somerset; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 11:50AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...SCATTERED HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN CENTRE... SOMERSET...CLEARFIELD...BLAIR...CAMBRIA...HUNTINGDON...AND SOUTHERN CENTRE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow showers accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. Road surfaces may become slushy and slippery. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1148 AM EDT, an area of heavy snow showers was tracking into the Laurel Highlands and South Central Mountains moving east at 40 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED... These snow showers will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Northern Centre, central Somerset, southwestern Clearfield, central Blair, Cambria, northwestern Huntingdon and southwestern Southern Centre Counties. * This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 100 to 119. Interstate 99 from mile markers 27 to 61. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or slush covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Blair; Cambria; Clearfield; Huntingdon; Northern Centre; Somerset; Southern Centre
